page.title: 19Whittington W.I.
page.content: {Whittington Womens' Institute}meet at the Community Centre on the second Thursday of the month between 7.30p.m. and 9.00p.m..It is 10p to get in and 10p for refreshments.When you go in, there is a box marked flowers.This is for donations for people who are ill or in hospital so that they can be sent a bouquet of flowers.The W.I. also have competitions.When a show crops up like the West Midlands or the Oswestry, some members of the W.I. make knitted or crocheted items and often win a rosette or a certificate. They sometimes set up their own stall to show what they have made recently. Experts in cookery and crafts demonstrate for the W.I..The W.I. have a secretary who reads out the minutes of the last meeting.The W.I.,an organisation for women of all ages,go for outings and treasure hunts.
